message.content:
I need to find the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the given financial statements.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see a section for "Cash and Cash Equivalents" which explicitly states:

| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Beginning Balance | 8000000.00 | 2024-02-01 |

This clearly indicates that the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents was $8,000,000.00.

This is also consistent with the balance sheet, which shows that at the initial date (2023-12-31), the combined value of "Cash on Hand" ($3,000,000.00) and "Bank Deposits" ($5,000,000.00) equals $8,000,000.00, which represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
